summary: Auto-Potion determined on health or do it manually / Auto-equip arrows when a bow is equipped and de-equip the arrows when bow is no longer equipped, Sneak has a ghost-form (customizable) to hide in the shadows, Dual-wield with your weapons more fluidly (includes smithing / enchanted and quest reward weapons), AND MORE!!!
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]Announcement topic is now open under the discussion area that will house the release and future development progress information of Thief, if you could pease do not post in this area[/size]

[size=5]Report any Bugs / Improvements under the appropriate discussion topic area, not under the comments to keep things organized[/size]

[center]
[size=3]Shadow Step[/size] is a new ability that is being worked on, allows the player while they are in combat to either target the enemy with the cross-hair or if no enemy is in the players cross-hair then it will find a random enemy and teleporting the player next to the enemy.. (does have an effect too it, much like Shadow Warrior). Enemy must have some distance between the player in order for it to work. It has some bugs, im not confident yet to have this released for Thief 0.6a yet maybe in a future release
[youtube]2aZ52XaE3ZI[/youtube]
[/center]

[center]
Ghost Form changes in 0.6a, requires the player to be submerged in the shadows, no speckle of light must be on the player aka (Light ray between the tree leaves)
[youtube]M5XMrdZJgaU[/youtube]
[/center]

[center]
First part of the video showing the Archery Skill tree showing that i do not have Bullzeye Perk, 2nd Part is showing the Spectral Arrow demonstration chance to shoot a second arrow to knockdown the enemy, 3rd Part is showing the Disarm ability, and 4th part is the Paralyzing Potion which you throw to the ground and will consume one potion (30 second cool-down for the Paralyzing Potion)

Video is a demonstration and subject could change before Thief 0.6a is released
[youtube]tjM8d1oAvxA[/youtube]
[/center]

[center]
Power Attack Demo - against the Darkbrother Hood, My character had no Shouts or Spells learned, and was not equipped with any ALCHEMY / SMITHING / ENCHANT exploit\'ed gear
[youtube]XigqzziO5Rg[/youtube]
[/center]

[center]
Video shows a demostration of the features in 0.4a and some features to arrive in 0.5a
[youtube]0RFBWDNhNjI[/youtube]
[/center]

[size=4][color=#4E2A2A]%%[/color][color=#6B2323]%%[/color][color=#891C1C]%%[/color][color=#A61515]%%[/color][color=#C40E0E]%%[/color][color=#E10707]%%[/color][color=#FF0000]%%[/color][/size]  [size=4][color=#AFEEEE][[/color] VERSION HISTORY [color=#AFEEEE]][/color][/size]
[b][color=#40FF40]0.6b[/color][/b]
- Fixed some minor bugs with the Random percent chance the following abilities Spectral Arrow / Disarm when blocking
- FusRoDa can only occour during blood-sigma (red splatter during a power attack)
- Check INI for full changes
- Percent Chance is editable inside INI for the following abilities Spectral Arrow, Power Attack (FusRoDa), Disarm when Blocking
- Auto-potion is disabled by default during the Werewolf phase (you can enable it inside the INI if you like)

[b][color=#40FF40]0.6a[/color][/b]
- New abilities, Spectral Arrow, Disarm, Mass Paralysis Potion
- Ghost Form now requires the player to be fully submerged into the shadows

[b][color=#40FF40]0.5a[/color][/b]
- Player is now able to convert Magicka Potions into Health Potions via Alchemy Lab (Requires HOTKEY to use, Default is SHIFT+X)
- Special Power Attack requires Dual-wielding, Random Chances occur to have special effect (cast a free Fus Ro Da, magnitude is based on players current level)

[b][color=#40FF40]0.4a[/color][/b]
- This Docuement has been updated, check for changes
- Minor bug fixes
- Auto Potion has been improved, no longer consumes 3-4 potions at once which caused crashing during combat if the player died 
- Auto Potion now has a 5 second cooldown (before was 10)
- Manual Potion also shares the same cooldown, which you can edit in the .ini
- Ghost form is disabled in First Person View ONLY (you can renable in the .ini, if you liked ghost form while in first person)
- Power Attack heighten when dual-wielding weapons (enabled by default)

[b][color=#40FF40]0.3b[/color][/b]
- More customizations for the .ini you can now enable or disable required perks for the these features [Ghost Form / Dual-wielding]
- Perks are enabled by default

[b][color=#40FF40]0.3a[/color][/b]
- Fixed a bug with quick-saving, should no longer give you a permanent effect on your ghost form

[b][color=#40FF40]0.2a[/color][/b]
- Fixed some bugs
- added booleans in the .ini to turn certian things on / off (example now able to only enable Auto Equip Arrows when a bow is present)
- No longer able to duplicate your replenished arrows if you unequip them and pick them back up
- Ghost Form now requires the perk \"Light Foot\" in the Sneak skill tree
- Fluid Dual-wield feature now requires \"Dual Flurry\" perk in the OneHanded skill tree

[b][color=#40FF40]0.1a[/color][/b]
- Initial Release

[size=4][color=#4E2A2A]%%[/color][color=#6B2323]%%[/color][color=#891C1C]%%[/color][color=#A61515]%%[/color][color=#C40E0E]%%[/color][color=#E10707]%%[/color][color=#FF0000]%%[/color][/size]  [size=4][color=#AFEEEE][[/color] DESCRIPTION [color=#AFEEEE]][/color][/size]
What is Thief?
[list]
[*] Auto-Potion / Manual Potion
[*] Ghost form while Sneaking
[*] Replenish Arrows based on character level
[*] Better Dual-wielding support
[*] Equippable Arrows when a Bow is present
[*] Power attack has a dramatic effect too it to heighten the players experience during dual-wielding
[*] Convert Magicka Potions into Health Potions
[*] Mass Paralysis Potion
[*] Spectral Arrow
[*] Chance to Disarm your enemy when they are blocking
[/list]

[size=4][color=#FFFF00]?[/color][/size] [size=1][color=#646464][[/color][/size][size=2][color=#8A8A8A][[/color][/size][size=3][color=#B1B1B1][[/color][/size][size=3][b][color=#3399FF]Mass Paralysis Potion[/color][/b][/size][size=3][color=#B1B1B1]][/color][/size][size=2][color=#8A8A8A]][/color][/size][size=1][color=#646464]][/color][/size]
[size=2][color=red]NOTE[/color][/size] - [b]Do not assign the hotkey to a in-game hotkey that is being used so they do not conflict with eachother[/b]
Requires any type of Paralysis Potion and HOTKEY to use it, will paralyize your victims by throwing it onto the ground there is a small chance for them to resist it

How can i edit my Mass Paralysis Key? (DEFAULT is 1)
[color=#00ffee][[/color][color=#66ff22]main[/color][color=#00ffee]][/color]
[color=#9999FF]Paralysis_Key[/color] = [color=#FF4040][b]1[/b][/color]


How can i disable this feature?
[color=#00ffee][[/color][color=#66ff22]Potion[/color][color=#00ffee]][/color]
[color=#9999FF]nMassParalysisEnable[/color] = [color=#FF4040][b]0[/b][/color]


[size=4][color=#FFFF00]?[/color][/size] [size=1][color=#646464][[/color][/size][size=2][color=#8A8A8A][[/color][/size][size=3][color=#B1B1B1][[/color][/size][size=3][b][color=#3399FF]Spectral Arrow[/color][/b][/size][size=3][color=#B1B1B1]][/color][/size][size=2][color=#8A8A8A]][/color][/size][size=1][color=#646464]][/color][/size]
Random chance to shoot a second arrow that will follow the first arrow to knock down the enemy
 
How can i disable this feature?
[color=#00ffee][[/color][color=#66ff22]Arrow[/color][color=#00ffee]][/color]
[color=#9999FF]nSpectralArrowEnable[/color] = [color=#FF4040][b]0[/b][/color]


[size=4][color=#FFFF00]?[/color][/size] [size=1][color=#646464][[/color][/size][size=2][color=#8A8A8A][[/color][/size][size=3][color=#B1B1B1][[/color][/size][size=3][b][color=#3399FF]Disarm[/color][/b][/size][size=3][color=#B1B1B1]][/color][/size][size=2][color=#8A8A8A]][/color][/size][size=1][color=#646464]][/color][/size]
[size=2][color=red]NOTE[/color][/size] - [b]BEWARE if the enemy is too strong they will be immune to the disarm[/b]
You have a chance to disarm the enemy when they are blocking your current attacks, they also have a chance to resist, the power of the disarm is based on your current level

How can i disable this feature?
[color=#00ffee][[/color][color=#66ff22]Combat[/color][color=#00ffee]][/color]
[color=#9999FF]nDisarmEnable[/color] = [color=#FF4040][b]0[/b][/color]


[size=4][color=#FFFF00]?[/color][/size] [size=1][color=#646464][[/color][/size][size=2][color=#8A8A8A][[/color][/size][size=3][color=#B1B1B1][[/color][/size][size=3][b][color=#3399FF]Auto-Potion[/color][/b][/size][size=3][color=#B1B1B1]][/color][/size][size=2][color=#8A8A8A]][/color][/size][size=1][color=#646464]][/color][/size]
[size=2][color=red]NOTE[/color][/size] - [b]AUTO POTION IS NOT GOD MODE, it still requires the player to be smart[/b]

10 Second Cooldown, and must be in combat for the Auto-Potion / Manual Potion to work, it will calculate the health differences and use the appropriate health potion. You must infact have the potions in your characters inventory for it to work

It will restore Health and Stamina. [b]Potion_key[/b] is only enabled if you disabled Auto Potion feature. This allows you to potion your self manually it also shares the cooldown

How can i edit my Manual Potion Key? (DEFAULT is X)
[color=#00ffee][[/color][color=#66ff22]main[/color][color=#00ffee]][/color]
[color=#9999FF]Potion_Key[/color] = [color=#FF4040][b]X[/b][/color]


How do i enable Manual Potions?
[color=#00ffee][[/color][color=#66ff22]Potion[/color][color=#00ffee]][/color]
[color=#9999FF]nEnableAutoUse[/color] = [color=#FF4040][b]0[/b][/color]


How do i disable the potion feature overall?
[color=#00ffee][[/color][color=#66ff22]Potion[/color][color=#00ffee]][/color]
[color=#9999FF]nEnable[/color] = [color=#FF4040][b]0[/b][/color]


[size=4][color=#FFFF00]?[/color][/size] [size=1][color=#646464][[/color][/size][size=2][color=#8A8A8A][[/color][/size][size=3][color=#B1B1B1][[/color][/size][size=3][b][color=#3399FF]Ghost Form[/color][/b][/size][size=3][color=#B1B1B1]][/color][/size][size=2][color=#8A8A8A]][/color][/size][size=1][color=#646464]][/color][/size]
[size=2][color=red]NOTE[/color][/size] - [b]BY DEFAULT: Now requires Light Foot perk in the Sneak skill tree, and supports the Ebony Smoke Mail form[/b]
[size=2][color=red]NOTE[/color][/size] - [b]UPDATE 0.6a: Player must be fully submerged into the shadows in order for Ghost form to work[/b]

Allows the player to go into a ghost form while they are sneaking, when the player starts combat ghost form will dissipate from the player and will return once out of combat as long as the play is still sneaking

[color=#00ffee][[/color][color=#66ff22]Sneak[/color][color=#00ffee]][/color]
[color=#9999FF]nFormType[/color] = [color=#FF4040][b]2[/b][/color]


nFormType that is supported based on configuration
[list]
[*] 1 - Ghost Form
[*] 2 - Ebony Smoke Mail
[/list]

What if i dont want to the perk requirement to use Ghost Form?
[color=#00ffee][[/color][color=#66ff22]Sneak[/color][color=#00ffee]][/color]
[color=#9999FF]nPerk[/color] = [color=#FF4040][b]0[/b][/color]


[size=4][color=#FFFF00]?[/color][/size] [size=1][color=#646464][[/color][/size][size=2][color=#8A8A8A][[/color][/size][size=3][color=#B1B1B1][[/color][/size][size=3][b][color=#3399FF]Alchemy Lab[/color][/b][/size][size=3][color=#B1B1B1]][/color][/size][size=2][color=#8A8A8A]][/color][/size][size=1][color=#646464]][/color][/size]
You can now convert your unwanted Magicka Potions into Health Potions via Alchemy Lab, you must be \"USING IT\" and when your ready press the default HOTKEY (SHIFT+X) to convert your magicka potions. You will recieve Alchemy skill experience based on your Current Level / Alchemy Level / Ammount that was converted

Depending on your Alchemy [b]Experimenter[/b] Perk you can create additional potions

How can i edit my Alchemy Lab Key? (Default is SHIFT+X)
[color=#00ffee][[/color][color=#66ff22]Main[/color][color=#00ffee]][/color]
[color=#9999FF]AlchemyLab_Key[/color] = [color=#FF4040][b]SHIFT+X[/b][/color]


How can i disable the skill advance when converting potions?
[color=#00ffee][[/color][color=#66ff22]Potion[/color][color=#00ffee]][/color]
[color=#9999FF]nAlchemySkillAdvanceEnable[/color] = [color=#FF4040][b]0[/b][/color]


[size=4][color=#FFFF00]?[/color][/size] [size=1][color=#646464][[/color][/size][size=2][color=#8A8A8A][[/color][/size][size=3][color=#B1B1B1][[/color][/size][size=3][b][color=#3399FF]Special Power Attack[/color][/b][/size][size=3][color=#B1B1B1]][/color][/size][size=2][color=#8A8A8A]][/color][/size][size=1][color=#646464]][/color][/size]
[size=2][color=red]NOTE[/color][/size] - [b]Player must be Dual-wielding and be above 15% Stamina in order to use the special power attack[/b]

Random effect (one or both can effect at the same time). When doing a power attack you have a chance to break through the wind allowing you to call \"Fus Ro Da\" for free and paper debris will fly scattering away from the player, magnitude is depended on the players level

How can i disable the Power Attack completely?
[color=#00ffee][[/color][color=#66ff22]Combat[/color][color=#00ffee]][/color]
[color=#9999FF]nPowerAttackEnable[/color] = [color=#FF4040][b]0[/b][/color]


How can i edit the Cooldown ability of Fus Ro Da? (7 is the Default) 
[color=#00ffee][[/color][color=#66ff22]Combat[/color][color=#00ffee]][/color]
[color=#9999FF]nFusRoDaCooldown[/color] = [color=#FF4040][b]7[/b][/color]


Do i have to have Fus / Fus Ro / Fus Ro Da shout learned?
No, you do not

What are the magnitude ranges based on level?
[list]
[*] Fus         [Level 1-10]
[*] Fus Ro      [Level 30-50]
[*] Fus Ro Da   [Level 50+]
[/list]

[size=4][color=#FFFF00]?[/color][/size] [size=1][color=#646464][[/color][/size][size=2][color=#8A8A8A][[/color][/size][size=3][color=#B1B1B1][[/color][/size][size=3][b][color=#3399FF]Arrows Replenish Mode[/color][/b][/size][size=3][color=#B1B1B1]][/color][/size][size=2][color=#8A8A8A]][/color][/size][size=1][color=#646464]][/color][/size]
[size=2][color=red]NOTE[/color][/size] - [b]DISABLED BY DEFAULT: You can only have 1 Arrow Feature enabled [color=#FFA500][[/color][color=#33cccc]Only works with Vanilla Arrows, sorry no 3rd party addon support[/color][color=#FFA500]][/color][/b]
Will give the player 50 Arrows based on your level, if the player has no more arrows your character will replenish your stock of arrows. The arrows are automatically unequipped if you do not have a bow equipped, and will re-equip soon as you equip your bow
[b]Lower level arrows are destroyed in the process to free up your inventory[/b]

[color=#00ffee][[/color][color=#66ff22]Arrow[/color][color=#00ffee]][/color]
[color=#9999FF]nAutoEquipBowEnable[/color] = [color=#FF4040][b]0[/b][/color]
[color=#9999FF]nAutoRestockEnable[/color] = [color=#FF4040][b]1[/b][/color]


[size=4][color=#FFFF00]?[/color][/size] [size=1][color=#646464][[/color][/size][size=2][color=#8A8A8A][[/color][/size][size=3][color=#B1B1B1][[/color][/size][size=3][b][color=#3399FF]Equippable Arrows with Bow[/color][/b][/size][size=3][color=#B1B1B1]][/color][/size][size=2][color=#8A8A8A]][/color][/size][size=1][color=#646464]][/color][/size]
[size=2][color=red]NOTE[/color][/size] - [b]ENABLED BY DEFAULT: You can only have 1 Arrow Feature enabled [color=#FFA500][[/color][color=#33cccc]Only works with Vanilla Arrows, sorry no 3rd party addon support[/color][color=#FFA500]][/color][/b]
Arrows will automatically be equipped or unequipped depending if a bow is present in the players hand / back

If you have this feature enabled. it will only equip the highest amount of arrows you have in a stock

[b]example[/b]:
Say you have 100 Daedric Arrows.. but you have 300 Steel Arrows.. it will automatically equip the Steel Arrows because you have more of them

[color=#00ffee][[/color][color=#66ff22]Arrow[/color][color=#00ffee]][/color]
[color=#9999FF]nAutoEquipBowEnable[/color] = [color=#FF4040][b]1[/b][/color]
[color=#9999FF]nAutoRestockEnable[/color] = [color=#FF4040][b]0[/b][/color]


[size=4][color=#FFFF00]?[/color][/size] [size=1][color=#646464][[/color][/size][size=2][color=#8A8A8A][[/color][/size][size=3][color=#B1B1B1][[/color][/size][size=3][b][color=#3399FF]Dual-wielding[/color][/b][/size][size=3][color=#B1B1B1]][/color][/size][size=2][color=#8A8A8A]][/color][/size][size=1][color=#646464]][/color][/size]
[size=2][color=red]NOTE[/color][/size] - [b]BY DEFAULT: Now requires Dual Flurry perk in the OneHanded skill tree[/b]

Allows you to be fluid with dual-wielding your one-handed items. It detects if you have a one handed weapon, it is then shadow copied to your left hand
When selecting a [b]DualWield_Key[/b] setting please put it on the key where you draw out your 1 handed weapon (use your in-game hotkey)

For example.. i hotkey mine to 8, when i press 8 (in-game hotkey) it will switch to my one handed weapon.. then Theif detects if 8 was pressed and will
then proceed to update my dual-wielding and it will shadow-copy that weapon to my left hand 
(from my knowledge all 1 handed weapons are supported even 3rd party addons, please report if you find different)

When equiping your spells (Thief will detect that too) it will remove the shadow copied weapon allowing you to use a weapon and spell, and when your ready to go
back to dual-wielding press your [b]Dualwield_key[/b] (mine was 8, above example shows)

Does this work with [i]Enchanted / Smithing / Quest[/i] reward weapons? the answer to that is [i]YES[/i]
Ive tested it with Enchanted Weapons / Smithing / Blade of Woe etc and so far everything was shadow copied

[color=#00ffee][[/color][color=#66ff22]main[/color][color=#00ffee]][/color]
[color=#9999FF]DualWield_Key[/color] = [color=#FF4040][b]8[/b][/color]


To disable the perk requirement set it to this
[color=#00ffee][[/color][color=#66ff22]DualWield[/color][color=#00ffee]][/color]
[color=#9999FF]nPerk[/color] = [color=#FF4040][b]0[/b][/color]


[size=4][color=#FFFF00]?[/color][/size] [size=1][color=#646464][[/color][/size][size=2][color=#8A8A8A][[/color][/size][size=3][color=#B1B1B1][[/color][/size][size=3][b][color=#3399FF]Why the name Thief[/color][/b][/size][size=3][color=#B1B1B1]][/color][/size][size=2][color=#8A8A8A]][/color][/size][size=1][color=#646464]][/color][/size]
Well this was originally based for Personal Use, then i thought i would share it with others. I play a thief character and some of the things became annoying during gameplay.I always wanted my arrows to equip them selves when i had a bow equipped, when i would sneak around i would think.. man it would be cool to be a ghost in the shadows because while sneaking in vanilla it just didnt give me that feeling. The auto-potion was because i would like to play a dual-wield character and i got tired of having to go back and forth of my inventory or having to watch my health all the time

Will i be adding more to Thief? Yes.. i will be. STAY TUNED


[size=4][color=#4E2A2A]%%[/color][color=#6B2323]%%[/color][color=#891C1C]%%[/color][color=#A61515]%%[/color][color=#C40E0E]%%[/color][color=#E10707]%%[/color][color=#FF0000]%%[/color][/size]  [size=4][color=#AFEEEE][[/color] INSTALL [color=#AFEEEE]][/color][/size]
Just place [color=00ffee][[/color][b][size=2][color=#66ff22]Thief.asi[/color][/size][/b][color=00ffee]][/color] & [color=00ffee][[/color][b][size=2][color=#66ff22]Thief.ini[/color][/size][/b][color=00ffee]][/color] into your /Skyrim/ASI directory (if the ASI Subfolder does not exist please create it), then run the game as normal.

[size=4][color=#4E2A2A]%%[/color][color=#6B2323]%%[/color][color=#891C1C]%%[/color][color=#A61515]%%[/color][color=#C40E0E]%%[/color][color=#E10707]%%[/color][color=#FF0000]%%[/color][/size]  [size=4][color=#AFEEEE][[/color] REQUIREMENTS [color=#AFEEEE]][/color][/size]
Dragon Script is required for this mod to work

[size=4][color=#4E2A2A]%%[/color][color=#6B2323]%%[/color][color=#891C1C]%%[/color][color=#A61515]%%[/color][color=#C40E0E]%%[/color][color=#E10707]%%[/color][color=#FF0000]%%[/color][/size]  [size=4][color=#AFEEEE][[/color] OTHER MODS OF MINE [color=#AFEEEE]][/color][/size]
PerQ - [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5451]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5451[/url]
Arcane Assassin - [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5189]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5189[/url]
Character Export - [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2569]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2569[/url]
Magi - [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3195]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3195[/url]
Way of the Monk - [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3891]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3891[/url]
GearSwap - [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3664]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3664[/url]

[size=2][color=red]NOTE[/color][/size] - [b]If you find this mod useful, please show your support by tagging / voting and endorsing it[/b]
author: PROXiCiDE

files.name: Thief_05a
files.changelogHtml:
Player is now able to convert Magicka Potions into Health Potions via Alchemy Lab (Requires HOTKEY to use, Default is SHIFT+X)
Special Power Attack requires Dual-wielding, Random Chances occur to have special effect (cast a free Fus Ro Da, magnitude is based on players current level)

files.name: Thief_06a
files.changelogHtml:
New abilities, Spectral Arrow, Disarm, Mass Paralysis Potion
Added video about the ability called \"Shadow Step\" in a future release of Thief that is being worked on
Check Documentation on the Thief Page for any changes
Ghost Form change, now requires player to be hidden inside the shadows for it to work

files.name: Thief
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed some minor bugs with the Random percent chance the following abilities Spectral Arrow / Disarm when blocking
FusRoDa can only occour during blood-sigma (red splatter during a power attack)
Check INI for full changes
Percent Chance is editable inside INI for the following abilities Spectral Arrow, Power Attack (FusRoDa), Disarm when Blocking
Auto-potion is disabled by default during the Werewolf phase (you can enable it inside the INI if you like)

files.name: Thief Source Code
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed some minor bugs with the Random percent chance the following abilities Spectral Arrow / Disarm when blocking
FusRoDa can only occour during blood-sigma (red splatter during a power attack)
Check INI for full changes
Percent Chance is editable inside INI for the following abilities Spectral Arrow, Power Attack (FusRoDa), Disarm when Blocking
Auto-potion is disabled by default during the Werewolf phase (you can enable it inside the INI if you like)
